ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: RE: Bellow song Damage
>
> I still can't figure why the other classes that everyone (including
> Verant) says are hybrids get 5 or 6 melee skills over and above Dodge,
and
> we get only the one. You'd think we'd get some magical skills to
> compensate, but we don't even get the benefit of a swifter memorization
from
> meditate. Heck it takes me longer to memorize my highest level spell
than
> it does our cleric to memorize all eight of his spells.

I agree that Bards get screwed by the slow memorization of songs. But come
on Kitasi, you know good and well that Bards have better magical abilities
that compensate for the lesser combat abilities of the other hybrids.

I don't want to go down this road again, but Bards have a clear Spell
(Song) advantage over every other hybrid.


Wayne
